channel.title: Openai on Edd Mann
channel.description: Recent content in Openai on Edd Mann

item.title: Using LangChain Agents and Tools to answer questions on the NBA with OpenAI
item.description: Large language models (OpenAI/ChatGPT in particular) are all the rage at the moment. Like many developers, I am interested in exploring what is possible with this new technology. This post documents the use of LangChain Agents/Tools to aid in answering questions based on recent NBA events.
